main.title: Hi, I'm Thaisley
main.subtitle: UI/UX Designer & Logo Designer
about_me.description1: I am passionate about technology and I love solving problems, that's why I decided to start my studies in UX and UI Design.
about_me.description2: I currently work at a fintech as UI / UX Design. And I've been doing brand design for 5 years as a freelancer, which is exactly where it all started.
about_me.description3: Design is much more than aesthetics, it is helping people to solve problems. I would love to help solve yours :)
about_me.description_more: You can see more where I went by looking at my likedin:
